word:
Christ has carried His humanity into eternity. He stands before God as the representative of our race. When we are 
75
clothed with the wedding garment of His righteousness, we become one with Him, and He says of us, “They shall walk with me in white: for they are worthy.” His saints will behold Him in His glory, with no dimming veil between.—YI October 28, 1897 quoted in 7BC 925.
